acceptanceCriteria: Page 2 (route "/page2") renders a heading that matches the first line of the provided message exactly, including emojis and capitalization.
Page 2 renders the remaining message content exactly as provided, preserving line breaks and spacing (including the double-space in "aur  un dino"), when viewed in the browser.
No changes occur to Page 1 letter text, Page 3 final message, navigation routes, or sessionStorage gating logic.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all text sourcing centralized via frontend/src/content/storyContent.ts (do not duplicate the message text inside page components).
nonGoals: Changing the app visual theme, layout, or animations.
Adding new routes/pages or modifying the sequential navigation flow.
